doc:
Amanda Winn-Lee https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Amanda_Winn-Lee 0 Amanda Beth Winn-Lee (born November 14, 1972) is an American voice actress, ADR director and script writer who works mainly on anime dubs. She was the voice of Mimiru in .hack//SIGN, Rally Vincent in Gunsmith Cats, Yohko Mano in Devil Hunter Yohko, Momiji Kushinada in Blue Seed and was featured most notably as Rei Ayanami of Neon Genesis Evangelion fame. Aside from voice work she quite often handles production, ADR direction and the scripting of various projects for her dubbing company Gaijin Productions, LLC. She has also been credited as Amanda Winn, before she was married. Amanda_Beth_Winn-Lee ( born November_14_,_1972 ) is an_American_voice_actress , ADR_director_and_script_writer who works mainly on anime dubs . She was the_voice of Mimiru in . hack / / SIGN , Rally_Vincent in Gunsmith_Cats , Yohko_Mano in Devil_Hunter_Yohko , Momiji_Kushinada in Blue_Seed and was_featured most_notably as Rei_Ayanami of Neon_Genesis_Evangelion_fame . Aside from voice_work she quite often handles production , ADR_direction and the_scripting of various_projects for her_dubbing_company_Gaijin_Productions , LLC . She has_also_been_credited as Amanda_Winn , before she was married .
